publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2112 Donald Gorrie: Erskine—That the Parliament recognises the contribution made to Scottish life by the Erskine organisation through its care for ex-servicemen and women throughout Scotland since its foundation in 1916 as Erskine Hospital for men who had lost a limb in the First World War; recognises its continuation as an independent Scottish charity supported by voluntary contributions, providing physical and emotional care to ex-service people harmed in the Second World War and the many wars since; further recognises its employment of people with disabilities in its commercial gardening, furniture and print outlets, and wishes it well in its continuing development of its services at Erskine and in Edinburgh. Supported by: Trish Godman*
S2M-2112 Erskine (lodged on 6 December 2004) Mr Brian Monteith*, Michael Matheson*

S2M-2112 Donald Gorrie: Erskine—That the Parliament recognises the contribution made to Scottish life by the Erskine organisation through its care for ex-servicemen and women throughout Scotland since its foundation in 1916 as Erskine Hospital for men who had lost a limb in the First World War; recognises its continuation as an independent Scottish charity supported by voluntary contributions, providing physical and emotional care to ex-service people harmed in the Second World War and the many wars since; further recognises its employment of people with disabilities in its commercial gardening, furniture and print outlets, and wishes it well in its continuing development of its services at Erskine and in Edinburgh. Supported by: Trish Godman, Mr Brian Monteith, Michael Matheson, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2112 Erskine (lodged on 6 December 2004) Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*, Colin Fox*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2112 Erskine (lodged on 6 December 2004) Mr David Davidson*
S2M-2112 Erskine (lodged on 6 December 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-2112 Erskine (lodged on 6 December 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-2112 Erskine (lodged on 6 December 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2112 Erskine (lodged on 6 December 2004) Elaine Smith*
S2M-2112 Erskine (lodged on 6 December 2004) Murray Tosh*
